sentence: A group of MAGA firebrands, including freshman Reps. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) and Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.), are catapulting into a GOP primary here to boost Christian Collins, a far-right activist who has vowed to govern in their image.
title: The primary foreshadowing the future of the GOP

sentence: In addition to Cruz, Collins boasted endorsements from North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn and those critical of McCarthy: a PAC aligned with the House Freedom Caucus and Georgia Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Navy SEAL Morgan Luttrell wins in Texas House primary that was GOP proxy war
